requestBody.description: Details of the agreement to create

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of existing agreement to update

delete.summary: Deletes an individual agreement attachment, specified by attachmentId.

post.summary: Creates a new order for the agreement specified in order body, or simultaneously creates and agreement in case of purchase order.

requestBody.description: Details of the order to create

put.summary: Updates order. Not every property can be updated. For example it's impossible to change state of the order, or assign it to another agreement.

delete.summary: Deletes order. Only applicable to draft orders.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to be deleted

post.summary: Places order, changing its status to processing.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to be processed

post.summary: Sets order status to querying, effectively returning it back to client for update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to be queried

post.summary: Completes the order. As result order gets status completed and agreement gets updated with order information.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to be completed

post.summary: Fails the order. Status changes to failed. State of the agreement doesn't change except the status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to be failed

post.summary: Validates order state. Internally calls validate endpoint of a connector.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to be completed

post.summary: Notifies a user about an order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of order to include in the notification

post.summary: Creates a new subscription for the order

requestBody.description: Details of the subscription to create

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the subscription to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of subscription to be deleted

delete.summary: Deletes an individual request attachment, specified by attachmentId.

put.summary: Updates an individual request attachment, specified by attachmentId.
Updates request. Not every property is updatable.

post.summary: Validates the request, and returns any error information at both request parameter and request level.

requestBody.description: Details of the subscription to create

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of existing agreement to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of existing agreement to terminate
